hero.subtitle: Nightly discovery and analysis of open-source Agent Skills across GitHub. AI-powered security auditing, semantic search, and unified skill management for every MCP-compatible agent.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search skills... (e.g., PDF processing, code review)

mcp.title: Universal Skill Management
mcp.subtitle: Why configure skills separately for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Codex, Gemini? One MCP server. Every agent. All skills.
mcp.feature1Desc: Search, discover, and install skills across all MCP-compatible agents from a single source of truth.
mcp.feature2Desc: Skills are instantly available to your agent. No manual setup, no scattered configs.
mcp.feature3Desc: Download skills locally for air-gapped environments and lightning-fast access.
mcp.pageTitle: ShareSkill MCP - Universal Agent Skill Management
mcp.pageDescription: Install ShareSkill MCP to discover, audit, and manage Agent Skills across Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Codex, Gemini, and any MCP-compatible agent.
mcp.heroSubtitle: The unified skill management layer for AI agents. One registry, every agent, all skills.
mcp.whyDesc: Managing Agent Skills across multiple AI assistants is fragmented. Each tool has its own configuration format, installation process, and skill storage. ShareSkill MCP provides a unified interface for all MCP-compatible agents.
mcp.semanticSearchDesc: Find skills using natural language. AI-powered search understands intent and returns the most relevant matches.
mcp.securityAuditedDesc: Every skill is analyzed by AI for security risks. Review detailed warnings before installation.
mcp.offlineFirstDesc: Download skills locally for air-gapped environments. Access your skills even without internet.
mcp.quickStartDesc: Add ShareSkill MCP to your AI agent in seconds.
mcp.otherAgentsNote: Any agent supporting the Model Context Protocol can use ShareSkill MCP. The configuration format is standardized - check your agent's documentation for the MCP config file location.
mcp.availableToolsDesc: ShareSkill MCP exposes these tools to your AI agent:
mcp.remoteSearchSkills: Search the registry by keyword or semantic query
mcp.remoteGetSkill: Fetch full skill details including SKILL.md content
mcp.remoteDownloadSkill: Download a skill to local storage
mcp.cliReferenceDesc: Manage skills directly from the command line:
mcp.downloadCmd: Download a skill to local storage
mcp.localStorageNote: Each skill is stored in its own directory containing the complete SKILL.md and any associated resources.
